name: Bigmans Big Brawl Web
description:
How many badmen can you defeat?

WASD to move

Mouse click  / E to punch

Shift + E to Kick

R to roll

Shift to run Don't fall from too much kicking or rolling!

Project page for more details:

https://jakematooch.com/work#/bigmans-big-brawl/ A two week self produced project of developing a survival fighting game.
